originalText.text: R & P & S House Painters was a great company. Very friendly and efficient and their work was excellent. I love the result of the paint job they did. The exterior of our house look stunning and new.

text.text: R & P & S House Painters was a great company. Very friendly and efficient and their work was excellent. I love the result of the paint job they did. The exterior of our house look stunning and new.

originalText.text: R & P & S House Painters did an amazing job! The painters  were 100% cooperative, diligent, professional and caring painters. We were so impressed by how carefully they covered the floors and furniture - we had never seen this much care taken to a paint job before. We would highly recommend them for any job!

text.text: R & P & S House Painters did an amazing job! The painters  were 100% cooperative, diligent, professional and caring painters. We were so impressed by how carefully they covered the floors and furniture - we had never seen this much care taken to a paint job before. We would highly recommend them for any job!

originalText.text: R & P & S House Painters and the crew did a fantastic job!  The head painter helped us pick out colors and guided us through the whole process.  Their popcorn removal, which must have been quite difficult given our high ceilings, was excellent.  They came back for the few areas that needed touch-ups, and our place looks amazingly better than when we bought it.

text.text: R & P & S House Painters and the crew did a fantastic job!  The head painter helped us pick out colors and guided us through the whole process.  Their popcorn removal, which must have been quite difficult given our high ceilings, was excellent.  They came back for the few areas that needed touch-ups, and our place looks amazingly better than when we bought it.

originalText.text: I hired R & P & S House Painters to paint our deck and kitchen. The crew was efficient, thorough; detail oriented and was able to deliver on time. I love how clean and fast they work. I would recommend this company without doubt.

text.text: I hired R & P & S House Painters to paint our deck and kitchen. The crew was efficient, thorough; detail oriented and was able to deliver on time. I love how clean and fast they work. I would recommend this company without doubt.

originalText.text: After getting 3 or more estimates from different companies our HOA decided to go with R & P & S House Painters.  Anthony was affordable and best of all always stayed in communication with me so I knew what was going on. Perfectly done job.
